replies.body:
I believe the anti-cheat was turned off in an effort to locate the source of the server lack but that wasn't it. Don't quote me on that though.

Fixing the lag is a high priority for the Developers at the moment.
Patience is an important virtue to have.

replies.body:
There was a particular player causing a portion of the lag that occurred today, but that issue has been sorted out.

Expect the lag to clear up over the next while.
